definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The Reapers' mines are definitely multi-purpose.
sentences.chinese: 收割者的雷肯定是多用途的。

sentences.english: And light multitaskers might be better at preserving their attention.
sentences.chinese: 并且轻度的一心多用者可能更擅长保持注意力。

sentences.english: It will allow computing to expand in all directions and serve ever more users.
sentences.chinese: 计算向各方向扩展，服务于更多用户。

sentences.english: Most micro- ohmmeters and DMMs don't have provisions for setting the test current.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的微欧姆计和数字多用表都不能设置测试电流。

sentences.english: It is a toll to ride instead of walk, worthy of the name of 'one car for multipurpose'.
sentences.chinese: 是名副其实的一车多用，还可达到代步的目的。

sentences.english: The performance of these different multiuser diversity schemes is not the same.
sentences.chinese: 然而不同多用户分集方案的系统性能不尽相同。

sentences.english: A multiuser detection method based on adaptive wavelet network is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基于自适应子波网络的多用户检测方法。

sentences.english: The Teknetics is a new high-performance multi-purpose professional grade metal detector.
sentences.chinese: 新型的高效能的，多用途的专业级别的黄金探测器。

sentences.english: In situations requiring wide range multi-speed DC motor.
sentences.chinese: 在要求宽范围调速的场合多用直流电动机。

sentences.english: Most prospects are going to start with generic search terms. Focus your energy there.
sentences.chinese: 潜在用户多用通用词搜索，要把精力放在此当用之处。

sentences.english: Wuhan, is the multi-purpose missile destroyer too.
sentences.chinese: “武汉”号，是一艘有多用途的导弹的驱逐舰。

sentences.english: Use your ears more than your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 多用你的耳，而非你的嘴。

sentences.english: A circular saw is a versatile tool for both rough and finish cutting.
sentences.chinese: 圆锯是一种多用途的工具，既能粗切也能细切。

sentences.english: Practise using the video until you feel quite at home with it.
sentences.chinese: 多用录象机，直到你能熟练使用为止。

sentences.english: In medicine and anatomy, the use of the term to refer to the telencephalon.
sentences.chinese: 医学及解剖学上，多用大脑指代端脑。

definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to be good at using (sth)/to put (sth) to good use
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to change over to/to switch to/to use (sth different)
to choose for some purpose/to select and use
to use (two words etc) together/to use (sth) continuously
to rely mainly on/to attach most importance to
